sentences.sContent: An expository treatise or series of annotations; an exegesis .
sentences.sContent_eng: An expository treatise or series of annotations; an exegesis .
sentences.sCn: 注释，训诂说明性的论述或一系列注解；

sentences.sContent: A theatrical scene requires an obstacle unless it is a pure connective or expository situation.
sentences.sContent_eng: A theatrical scene requires an obstacle unless it is a pure connective or expository situation.
sentences.sCn: 一个戏剧砙靶枰桓稣习?除非是单纯的连接或说明性的情况。

synos.tran: 说明的；解释的；评注的（等于expositive）

remMethod.val: 来自exposit(v. 解释， 说明)
